name: fetch-api-wrapper
description: A Node.js module that provides a typesafe wrapper class around the fetch api that is easily extendable ## Installation  ```sh npm install definitely-typed-fetch-api --save yarn add definitely-typed-fetch-api bower install definitely-typed-fetch-api --save ``` ## Usage ### TypeScript ```typescript import BaseService from './BaseService'; import { SmoothieOrderResponse, SmoothieOrder } from './smoothieServiceTypes';
author: Daniel Revie
